item.title: California Poppy — A Splendid Spring!
item.author: Zhihao Ruan
item.description: The winter of 2022–2023 has been an extremely wet one for California. The cold air from the North Pole rages down into the southern part of U.S. west coast, turning into heavy rain and snow. However, as a positive result, California is very likely to greet a splendid “super bloom” after several years of drought. Of all the flowers, California Poppy could be one of the most iconic flower species that worth a visit.
